mining

Class QTMiner

  • java.lang.Object
    • mining.QTMiner

  • public class QTMiner
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      QTMiner(double radius, java.lang.String distance)
      Class constructor.
      QTMiner(java.lang.String fileName)
      Class constructor that initialize the miner from a file

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int compute(Data data)
      Methods that implements the TQ algorithm: 1) build a cluster for each tuple that isn't clustered, including in the cluster the points (still-not-clustered in another cluster) that fall down the spherical neighborhood of the tuple that has radius "this.radius"; 2) save the candidate cluster more populated and remove all the references to this cluster contained in the set of still-not-clustered set; 3) return to the step 1 until there are still-not-clustered tuples.
      ClusterSet getClusterArray()
      Method that returns the set of clusters
      java.lang.String getTypeDistance()
      Method that returns the type of distance
      void save(java.lang.String fileName)
      Method that saves the result of clustering process on a file

      • getTypeDistance

        public java.lang.String getTypeDistance()

      • compute

        public int compute(Data data)
            throws ClusteringRadiusException,
                   EmptyDatasetException
        Methods that implements the TQ algorithm: 1) build a cluster for each tuple that isn't clustered, including in the cluster the points (still-not-clustered in another cluster) that fall down the spherical neighborhood of the tuple that has radius "this.radius"; 2) save the candidate cluster more populated and remove all the references to this cluster contained in the set of still-not-clustered set; 3) return to the step 1 until there are still-not-clustered tuples.
        Parameters:
        data - list of examples
        Returns:
        number of clusters discovered
        Throws:
        ClusteringRadiusException - exception
        EmptyDatasetException - exception

      • save

        public void save(java.lang.String fileName)
          throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Method that saves the result of clustering process on a file
        Parameters:
        fileName - file name
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - exception
